elements.text: While walking across the backyard during a family barbecue, you stumble and trip unexpectedly in front of your family. Your once-confident stride is now replaced by an unsteady gait. After tripping, you feel...

elements.name: Tripping at Family Barbecue_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
